text: Sore de tsuishomono-tachi wa iu. `Moshi watashi-tachi ga imaichido hiki kaesu koto ga dekirunaraba, kare-ra ga watashi-tachi o misuteta yo ni kare-ra o misuteru nodaga.' Arra wa kono yo ni, jibun no okonai (no kajitsu) o meiji sa reru. Kare-ra ni totte tsukon no soto naidearou. Kare-ra wa goka (no seme-ku) kara deru koto wa dekinai
